channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 周五，塞内加尔首都达喀尔再次爆发示威活动，抗议总统麦基-萨勒推迟总统选举的决定，警方使用催泪瓦斯驱散抗议者。
item.description: Police used teargas to disperse protesters in Senegal’s capital, Dakar, on Friday as demonstrations against President Macky Sall’s decision to delay presidential elections resumed trib.al/4ZXnpDY

item.title: 墨西哥折扣零售商 BBB Foods 在美国首次公开发行股票的定价为市场定价区间的最高价，其股票在首次交易中上涨了 19% 之多
item.description: Shares of Mexican discount retailer BBB Foods rose as much as 19% in its trading debut after its US initial public offering priced at the top of a marketed range trib.al/f1ZcvO9

item.title: 一艘俄罗斯油轮在受到美国制裁后，几乎立即在葡萄牙海岸附近调转船头
item.description: A Russian oil tanker performs a near-immediate u-turn off the coast of Portugal after being subjected to US sanctions trib.al/cMyALr5

item.title: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）首席执行官和其他内部人士购买了 20 多万股该公司股票，公司股价周五上涨。
item.description: New York Community Bancorp gained on Friday after its CEO and other insiders bought more than 200,000 shares of the stock trib.al/eWqptx0

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数刚刚突破 5000 点，创下历史新高。现在是买入的时候吗？
item.description: The S&P 500 just topped 5,000 in an all-time high. Is now the time to buy? trib.al/IanPV6k

item.title: 根据一项集体诉讼的修订诉状，亚马逊涉嫌在三名女员工起诉公司歧视后对她们进行报复。
item.description: Amazon allegedly retaliated against three female employees after they sued the company for discrimination, according to an amended complaint in a class lawsuit trib.al/Po5yOV7

item.title: 据美国一家大型管道运营商称，随着钻井效率的提高，西得克萨斯州和新墨西哥州多产的二叠纪盆地今年的石油产量有望再创新高。
item.description: Oil output from the prolific Permian Basin of West Texas and New Mexico is poised to rise to fresh record this year as drilling gets more efficient, according to a major US pipeline operator. trib.al/eGupkjc

item.title: 工党 280 亿英镑绿色承诺中的一大部分削减将来自能效措施，这是政治上最不讨人喜欢的绿色政策之一。另外，巴克莱银行的银行家们没有奖金。与@h_chandlerwilde一起获取解读
item.description: A chunk of the cuts to Labour's £28 billion green pledge will come from energy efficiency measures, one of the least politically unappetizing green policies. Plus, the Barclays bankers getting no bonus. Get The Readout with @h_chandlerwilde trib.al/yAjEEI7

item.title: 美国和欧盟正在商讨如何协调努力，共同打击中国在所谓关键矿产供应链中的主导地位
item.description: The US and the EU are in discussions to align efforts in their push against China’s dominance in the supply chain for so-called critical minerals trib.al/skmaPAb

item.title: 第一能源公司（FirstEnergy）放弃了 2030 年减少温室气体排放的目标，因为煤电厂无法及时被取代，这标志着保护气候运动的重大转变。
item.description: FirstEnergy abandoned its 2030 target for slashing greenhouse-gas emissions because coal plants can’t be replaced in time, marking a major about-face in the movement to protect the climate. trib.al/aEJURGO

item.title: 海外律师在印度执业的前景面临障碍，因为德里高等法院同意审理一份质疑此举的请愿书
item.description: The prospect of overseas lawyers practicing law in India faces a hurdle after the Delhi High Court agreed to hear a petition challenging the move trib.al/WDvCN2O

item.title: 欧洲的 "华丽 6 号 "将与 TPW 的 Jay Pelosky 的美国技术相媲美
item.description: Europe's 'Magnificent 6' to rival US Tech for TPW's Jay Pelosky trib.al/Hp4lOWF

item.title: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）试图放松对经济的管制，释放自由市场的活力，因此阿根廷 Bioceres Crop Solutions 公司正期待着本国农业的蓬勃发展。
item.description: Argentina's Bioceres Crop Solutions is eyeing an agricultural boom in its home nation as President Javier Milei seeks to deregulate the economy and unleash the free market trib.al/q3Mfw4i

item.title: 随着整个油气行业并购活动的升温，管道运营商平原公司正寻求进行更多交易
item.description: Pipeline operator Plains is looking to make more deals as merger and acquisition activity heats up across the oil and gas industry trib.al/ZHNiNtE

item.title: 纽约总检察长在修订后的民事起诉书中称，双子座信托公司和巴里-西尔伯特的数字货币集团涉嫌欺诈的规模是最初想象的三倍
item.description: The alleged fraud at Gemini Trust and Barry Silbert’s Digital Currency Group was three times bigger than initially thought, the New York attorney general said in revised civil complaint trib.al/v9Mdt5R

item.title: 沃尔玛、塔吉特和两位民主党市长正在支持一项旨在推翻加州具有里程碑意义的刑事司法改革的运动。
item.description: Walmart, Target and a pair of Democratic mayors are supporting a campaign to roll back California’s landmark criminal justice reform, which has been blamed for a spike in retail theft trib.al/We6OMoQ

item.title: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份最新报告，新任对冲基金经理筹集现金的过程非常艰难，而且看起来不会很快变得容易。
item.description: It’s tough out there for new hedge fund managers trying to raise cash, and it doesn’t look like it’ll get easier anytime soon, according to a new Goldman Sachs report trib.al/X6itMSB

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数在周四晚些时候短暂突破 5,000 点后，周五有望首次突破 5,000 点。
item.description: The S&P 500 Index is on track to finish above 5,000 for the first time ever on Friday after briefly breaching the threshold late Thursday trib.al/WD9tYDg

item.title: 阿根廷最大的公共工程公司之一资金耗尽，请求投资者宽大处理，矛头直指总统哈维尔-米莱。
item.description: As one of Argentina’s largest public works companies runs out of cash and asks investors for leniency, it’s pointing the blame squarely at Presdient Javier Milei trib.al/79D0432

item.title: 美国解除制裁后，包括雪佛龙（Chevron）和雷普索尔（Repsol）在内的石油巨头正在缓解委内瑞拉的燃料短缺问题，这是新交易的一部分，允许它们扩大在这个南美国家的业务。
item.description: Oil majors including Chevron and Repsol are alleviating Venezuela’s fuel shortages as part of new deals following the lifting of US sanctions that have allowed them to expand operations in the South American nation. trib.al/w3R2iWq

item.title: 新加坡总理李显龙敦促年轻夫妇多生孩子，因为这个城市国家正在与出生率下降作斗争
item.description: Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong urged young couples to have more babies as the city state battles with a declining birth rate trib.al/DV6g6eh

item.title: 澳大利亚将把自制航空战斗无人机项目的投资额提高 2.59 亿澳元，这也是澳大利亚军方更广泛改革的一部分。
item.description: Australia will increase its investment in a homemade aviation combat drone program by $259 million as part of a broader overhaul of the country’s military which has seen the government clash with senior defense figures trib.al/asmQlNP

item.title: 由于厄尔尼诺现象的影响弱于预期，秘鲁经济可能最终走出本世纪最严重的衰退期
item.description: Peru's economy could finally be emerging from its worst recession this century due to weaker-than-expected impact from El Nino trib.al/eZbDzH2

item.title: 据知情人士透露，Senoko Energy 的大股东正在考虑出售其在这家新加坡电力公司的股份，寻求高达 30 亿美元的估值。
item.description: The majority shareholders of Senoko Energy are considering selling their stakes in the Singapore-based power firm, seeking a valuation of as much as $3 billion, sources say. trib.al/liNLo2R

item.title: 消息人士称，曾是中国恒大离岸债务主要持有者的 Ashmore 集团去年年底完全退出了对这家陷入困境的房地产开发商的投资
item.description: Ashmore Group once a major holder of China Evergrande's offshore debt, fully exited its investment in the embattled property developer late last year, sources say trib.al/TAHOgxS

item.title: 拜登政府正在考虑限制中国 "智能汽车 "及相关零部件的进口，这将超出关税范围，以解决美国对数据安全日益增长的担忧。
item.description: The Biden administration is considering restrictions on imports of Chinese `smart cars' and related components that would go beyond tariffs to address growing US concerns about data security trib.al/bIicrXW

item.title: Genesis Global 已就纽约最高执法官员提起的诉讼达成和解，纽约最高执法官员指控这家破产的加密货币贷款公司欺诈客户，该公司与双子座信托公司（Gemini Trust）共同运营的 Gemini Earn 项目现已终止。
item.description: Genesis Global has settled a lawsuit brought by New York’s top law enforcement official alleging the bankrupt crypto lender defrauded customers of its now-terminated Gemini Earn program, which was run jointly with Gemini Trust trib.al/V891ZnK

item.title: 消息人士称，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）已放弃在香港的部分办公空间，这是全球银行为节约成本而缩减办公空间给香港商业地产市场带来的最新挫折。
item.description: Goldman Sachs has given up some office space in Hong Kong, sources say, the latest setback to the city’s commercial real estate market as global banks trim space to save costs trib.al/j9fZPJ1

item.title: 在中国长达十年的扩张狂潮中收购的新一批海外资产开始进入市场。这些资产的出售价格可能显示了整个行业正面临着多大的麻烦
item.description: A new batch of overseas assets acquired in a decade-long Chinese expansion spree are starting to hit the market. The sale prices may show how much trouble the wider industry is in trib.al/bBjEKuL

item.title: 在岸人民币走软的压力正在增大，政策制定者的非官方底线已被突破。
item.description: Pressure is building on the onshore yuan to weaken past an unofficial line in the sand for policymakers and this time traders are keeping as close an eye on happenings in Japan as they are Stateside trib.al/pIWsmtx
